metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36354 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the RLA format parser of OpenImageIO master-branch-9aeece7a and v2.3.19.0. More specifically, in the way run-length encoded byte spans are handled. A malformed RLA file can lead to an out-of-bounds read of heap metadata which can result in sensitive information leak. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
